QuestData.Title: Skitterer Stew
QuestData.Description: Leza has a fever. No mother in labor should have a fever.$b$bMama Bramblestaff once told me that Skitterer Stew could heal almost any illness. Let us put this knowledge to the test.$b$bGather some intact skitterer glands for me while I get the herbs we'll need and I'll whip up a batch.
